titleStmt.title: An epistle to be communicated to Friends & to be read in the fear of the Lord in their men and womens meetings, and other meetings, only among Friends as they in the wisdom of God shall see meet and serviceable
titleStmt.author: Niesen, Geertruyd Deriks.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Geertruyd Deriks Niesen.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
